Charles, after your update

pi@pi3bplus:~ $ python3 -m magnum.tools.magtest --timeout .005

pi@pi3bplus:~ $

Then with 100 count

pi@pi3bplus:~ $ python3 -m magnum.tools.magtest --timeout .005 -n 100
Options:cleanpackets=True, device='/dev/ttyUSB0', packets=100, timeout=0.005
